TopicTitle: Does tank center of mass change as fuel burns?

Articles.Content: I have seen this question before, but I can't find it through searching. Thanks for the help.

No.

It stays in the same place, but loses mass obviously.

... and drag is reduced due the special aerodynamic "model"

bsalis, don't play with new people like this!

Yes, your CoM will move as you burn fuel, so be careful if balance is important to your specific craft.
Thanks, that's convenient to know. I don't think he was playing with me, he was saying the tank center of mass will be the same but of course the vehicle center of mass may change.
Yeah likely, I think I'm too tired to be on the forums, I need sleep (sorry bsalis lol)

Yes... for an individual tank the CoM will stay in the same place as it empties.

As for your craft, that is a different matter. If you want the craft CoM to stay in the same place you need to arrange the tanks in a symmetric manner and have them drain symmetrically as well.
